title: Sugar Twin: Children's Pet Animals Bedtime Story
description: Meet Sugar Twin the silly little kitten and her loving family, when sugar twin goes missing everyone in the neighborhood comes together, you will love the ending!Read a few pages and you won't be able to stop. Check it out today and see for yourself.Grandparents will definitely enjoy reading this book to their grandchildren.** Read it FREE as part of your PRIME or Kindle Unlimited membership **
author: Betty J. Byers
